程序包 org.elasticsearch.cluster

类 ClusterStateUpdateTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.cluster.ClusterStateUpdateTask
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClusterStateTaskConfig, ClusterStateTaskExecutor<ClusterStateUpdateTask>, ClusterStateTaskListener
    直接已知子类:
    AckedClusterStateUpdateTask
    public abstract class ClusterStateUpdateTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterStateTaskConfig, ClusterStateTaskExecutor<ClusterStateUpdateTask>, ClusterStateTaskListener
    A task that can update the cluster state.

      • execute

        public final ClusterStateTaskExecutor.ClusterTasksResult<ClusterStateUpdateTask> execute​(ClusterState currentState,
                                                                                         java.util.List<ClusterStateUpdateTask> tasks)
                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterStateTaskExecutor
        Update the cluster state based on the current state and the given tasks. Return the *same instance* if no state should be changed.
        指定者:
        execute 在接口中 ClusterStateTaskExecutor<ClusterStateUpdateTask>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • describeTasks

        public java.lang.String describeTasks​(java.util.List<ClusterStateUpdateTask> tasks)
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterStateTaskExecutor
        Builds a concise description of a list of tasks (to be used in logging etc.). Note that the tasks given are not necessarily the same as those that will be passed to ClusterStateTaskExecutor.execute(ClusterState, List). but are guaranteed to be a subset of them. This method can be called multiple times with different lists before execution. This allows groupd task description but the submitting source.
        指定者:
        describeTasks 在接口中 ClusterStateTaskExecutor<ClusterStateUpdateTask>

      • execute

                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Update the cluster state based on the current state. Return the *same instance* if no state should be changed.

      • clusterStatePublished

        public final void clusterStatePublished​(ClusterChangedEvent clusterChangedEvent)
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterStateTaskExecutor
        Callback invoked after new cluster state is published. Note that this method is not invoked if the cluster state was not updated. Note that this method will be executed using system context.
        指定者:
        clusterStatePublished 在接口中 ClusterStateTaskExecutor<ClusterStateUpdateTask>
        参数:
        clusterChangedEvent - the change event for this cluster state change, containing both old and new states

      • timeout

        @Nullable
public TimeValue timeout()
        If the cluster state update task wasn't processed by the provided timeout, call ClusterStateTaskListener.onFailure(String, Exception). May return null to indicate no timeout is needed (default).
        指定者:
        timeout 在接口中 ClusterStateTaskConfig
        返回:
        the timeout, or null if one is not set

      • priority

        public Priority priority()
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterStateTaskConfig
        The Priority for this cluster state update task configuration.
        指定者:
        priority 在接口中 ClusterStateTaskConfig
        返回:
        the priority

      • runOnlyOnMaster

        public final boolean runOnlyOnMaster()
        Marked as final as cluster state update tasks should only run on master. For local requests, use LocalClusterUpdateTask instead.
        指定者:
        runOnlyOnMaster 在接口中 ClusterStateTaskExecutor<ClusterStateUpdateTask>
